DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate continuous oxytocin versus intermittent oxytocin induction labor term . Half participant take continuous oxytocin , half take intermittent oxytocin .
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Versus Intermittent Oxytocin Induction Labor : A Randomized Study
DOC.detailed_description: In continuous oxytocin group , traditional treatment oxytocin use start dose 1-2 mIU/min dose increase 2 mIU/min every 15 minute regular contraction obtain rate 3-5 contraction 10-minute period . The maximum dose oxytocin 40 mIU/min oxytocin administer delivery . In intermittent group , oxytocin discontinue cervical dilation 5 cm 2 hour discontinuation oxytocin reuse start dose 1-2 mIU/min increase protocol use continuation oxytocin group .
